delegation_details.description: Set up the foundation for Phase 2: Semantic & Contextual Analysis
delegation_details.acceptance_criteria:
1. Update analyzer components with proper interfaces for semantic analysis
2. Prepare the enricher components for contextual relationship mapping
3. Extend the metadata models to support semantic and contextual metadata
4. Update the processor to handle the new analyzers and enrichers
5. Create test fixtures for semantic and contextual analysis

delegation_details.description: Implement enhanced topic identification using NLP techniques
delegation_details.acceptance_criteria:
1. Implement NLP-based topic extraction
2. Identify key topics and themes in document content
3. Calculate topic relevance scores
4. Associate topics with document sections
5. Create tests for topic identification

delegation_details.description: Implement advanced entity recognition using NER techniques
delegation_details.acceptance_criteria:
1. Implement Named Entity Recognition (NER)
2. Identify people, organizations, locations, dates, etc.
3. Link entities to their mentions in the text
4. Calculate entity importance scores
5. Create tests for entity recognition

delegation_details.description: Implement contextual analysis of document elements
delegation_details.acceptance_criteria:
1. Analyze the context of structural elements
2. Determine the semantic context of todo items
3. Identify the context of links and references
4. Calculate contextual relevance scores
5. Create tests for contextual analysis

delegation_details.description: Implement relationship mapping between content elements
delegation_details.acceptance_criteria:
1. Identify relationships between content elements
2. Map relationships between documents
3. Calculate relationship strength scores
4. Create a relationship graph
5. Create tests for relationship mapping

delegation_details.description: Implement analysis of todo items for patterns and relationships
delegation_details.acceptance_criteria:
1. Analyze todo items for patterns
2. Identify dependencies between todo items
3. Determine priority based on context
4. Group related todo items
5. Create tests for todo item analysis

1. Analyze document structure hierarchy
2. Create a hierarchical representation of content
3. Identify parent-child relationships
4. Calculate structural importance scores
5. Create tests for hierarchical analysis

1. Create a network representation of content
2. Identify connections between elements
3. Calculate centrality and importance metrics
4. Visualize the network structure
5. Create tests for network analysis

1. Enrich content with semantic metadata
2. Add contextual information to elements
3. Link related concepts and ideas
4. Enhance todo items with semantic context
5. Create tests for semantic enrichment

delegation_details.description: Integrate all Phase 2 components and ensure they work together
delegation_details.acceptance_criteria:
1. Integrate all Phase 2 components
2. Ensure all components work together seamlessly
3. Update the main interface to expose new functionality
4. Create comprehensive integration tests
5. Update documentation with Phase 2 features

delegation_details.description: Review Phase 2 implementation and plan for Phase 3
delegation_details.acceptance_criteria:
1. All Phase 2 tasks are completed successfully
2. The implementation meets the goals defined in the evolution plan
3. Lessons learned are documented
4. Initial plan for Phase 3 is created
